name: Viewing details of the issuer of the attestation
scenarioId: android/New_version_of_the_wallet_UI_UX_2/View_Document_Redesign_114/viewDocument:Viewing details of the issuer of the attestation
methodName: Viewing details of the issuer of the attestation

testSteps.description: Given the user is registered to a valid EUDI Wallet on their mobile device
And attestations are issued in the EUDI Wallet
Given the user is viewing the details of an attestation
When the user navigates to the issuer details
Then the details of the issuer should be displayed

userStory.storyName: Viewing and managing attestations in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.displayName: Viewing and managing attestations in the EUDI Wallet
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to be able to view my attestations issued in the EUDI Wallet
  So that I can review the details of my issued attestation

title: Viewing details of the issuer of the attestation
